languages.text:
Thanks to its Servoskull Swarm, the Overseer has +{uip|LoreImperium|c2b1ef432de5499f8190352794357341}% Dodge and Armor.
This bonus is removed after the first combat encounter.

traits.locale_text:
Thanks to its Servoskull Swarm, the Overseer has +{uip|LoreImperium|c2b1ef432de5499f8190352794357341}% Dodge and Armor.
This bonus is removed after the first combat encounter.

languages.text: During the next combat, the servo-skull swarm will increase its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by +{uip|LoreImperium|c2b1ef432de5499f8190352794357341}%.
languages.original_text: В следующем бою рой сервочерепов увеличит {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} на {uip|LoreImperium|c2b1ef432de5499f8190352794357341}%.

traits.locale_text: During the next combat, the servo-skull swarm will increase its Overseer's dodge and armour by +{uip|LoreImperium|c2b1ef432de5499f8190352794357341}%.

traits.locale_text: В следующем бою рой сервочерепов увеличит уклонение и броню надзирателя на {uip|LoreImperium|c2b1ef432de5499f8190352794357341}%.

languages.text: 在下一场战斗中，伺服头骨集群可以使{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}主人{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高{uip|LoreImperium|c2b1ef432de5499f8190352794357341}%。

traits.locale_text: 在下一场战斗中，伺服头骨集群可以使主人的闪避与护甲提高{uip|LoreImperium|c2b1ef432de5499f8190352794357341}%。

languages.text: Au cours du prochain combat, l'essaim de servocrânes augmentera l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} de son {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} de +{uip|LoreImperium|c2b1ef432de5499f8190352794357341} %.

languages.text: 次の戦闘で、サーヴォスカル・スウォームは{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を+{uip|LoreImperium|c2b1ef432de5499f8190352794357341}%増加させる。
